overview: Jason Edwards has a background in the dot com, e-learning and logistics industries, specialising in the creation of revenue streams in a sales management capacity. Jason holds international sales and marketing skills; his experience, geographically and culturally covers Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Russia, the Czech Republic and the U.K. Jason previously was a Director on the board of AJBA, an organisation created for the purpose of networking entrepreneurial value to e-commerce companies in ASIA. Jason is also the co-founder of cBox Pty Ltd, a successful media, marketing and messaging company and the first subsidiary of Motopia Ltd (ASX : MOT). Jason has vast experience in startup companies boasting high growth in short time frames. Jasonâ€™s role as Executive Director on the Motopia board incorporates active management in maintaining the successful operations of the cBox subsidiary.
